attributes.action: Ban teachers from forcing students to turn on their camera
attributes.additional_details: ban the teacher from turning on our cameras
attributes.background: PUT AN END TO THIS ATROCITY, BY FREEING THE FUTURE GENERARIONS OF THIS TORTURE

rejection.details:
It is up to individual schools and teachers to decide how to deliver remote education, including whether teaching is delivered live, and if students are required to turn their cameras on.

The Government has published remote education good practice guidance, which you can read here: https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/remote-education-good-practice/remote-education-good-practice
